pages.text: Gangtoucunia is a tube worm like animal, known from the Chengjiang lagerstatten, although it is actually a cnidarian. They have hard tube shaped shells surrounding the squishy body. Specimens described in 2022 that preserve soft tissue allowed the classification into Cnidaria to become more certain.
